casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Skender HALILI Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 15, 2017

Lisa A. Riggione, senior assistant state's attorney, in support of the petition.

The state's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 175 Conn.App. 838, 168 A.3d 565 (2017), is denied.
